Reviews.Title: “Great place for a Dubai visit”

Reviews.Content: stayed pearl residence 4 days january 2012 hotel extremely value money breakfasts selections hotcold foods spacious lots storage space staff helpful location ideal 25 min walk creek 5 min mall metro station stay trip dubai

Reviews.Content: worst hotels experienced crusty meals left fridge filthy supposed sleep children floor level totally unacceptable surprising hotel recommended booked emirates definitely

Reviews.Content: pearl listed emirates handbook stars cant little handbook confirm possibly 2 star transfer service pearl bus type greeted warmly pearl shown dated bedroom apartment kitchen dining lounge comfortable queen size bed bathroom shiny marble shower bath seperate toilet elsewhere apartment washing machine included kitchen equipped didnt facilities disappointed apartment overall comparably australia 2 star night warmed standard wasnt expected pearl close supermarkets block underground airconditioned train service shopping mall burjuman block comment suggested pay little extra little classier uptodate

Reviews.Title: “Not the best!!”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed pearl residences booked stopover emirates airlines whilst heading asia value money arrival pleased frontage building reception staff pleasant unfortunately standard terms cleanliness extremely disappointing smelled cigarette smoke apartments cooking dining facilities cleanliness kitchen appliances left lot desired food stains cooking hobs table fridge cleaned trays inside stained previous occupants bathroom disgusting stained cracked tiles running showerbath wall grouting round bath replacement towels bathroom arrival calls reception rectify pity standard detract nice hotel public spotless facilities hotel badly refurb opinion

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 night stopover huge bed clean staff friendly helpful draw map staying save time location walking distance mall grocery store cant wrong

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights pearl residence teenage daughter pleased indeed checking checking staff pleasant cleaned day fresh towels toiletries replaced bedding apartments walking distance burjuman shopping centre centrepoint shopping centre spinneys supermarket main road minutes cab easily breakfast time busy sign selection breakfast items plentiful prepared stay shadow doubt accommodation basic clean value money

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”

Reviews.Content: hotel apartment booked office joing 1st december relatively dubai stop overs times request office book bur dubai start airport pick car sent pretty noisy clean wife stepped inside hotel pleasantly surprised cleanliness lobby reception check 2 minutes soon 7th floor studio appartment clean staff friendly teh service impeccable restaurant staff service guys happy accept requests stayed 15 days staff friendly days food tasty expensive breakfast spread lavish behaviour staff feel home
